posts.post_title: T206 FS - Graded, Zach Wheat (2) & Others
posts.post_content:
FS - T206s, all graded, Zach Wheat and others.  See scans - all prices delivered, Paypal (gift please), check or MO.  PM or email.

Thank you for your time and interest!

T206 Zach Wheat, SGC20, SC 350-460, Fact 42 (nice card for grade, slight paper chip on sleave) - $65
T206 Zach Wheat, PSA3, SC 350-460 - $120 **SOLD**
T206 Bob Spade, SGC40, SC 350 - $35
T206 Lou Ritter, SGC50, SC 350 - $45
T206 Jimmy Sheckard, PSA1, Piedmont 150 (Nice front, some paper loss on back is why a 1) - $23 **SOLD**
